hero.subtitle: Train with purpose. A private space for those who take discipline seriously.

philosophy.subtitle: Our Philosophy
philosophy.title: Discipline Creates Freedom
philosophy.description1: We are not a gym. We are a training space for those who understand that martial arts is a practice, not a performance.
philosophy.description2: Fighters, executives, expats, students. Different lives, same mat. Respect the space. Respect each other.

whyDifferent.subtitle: Our Approach
whyDifferent.title: Why Striker's House is Different
whyDifferent.description1: Here, competition and personal growth share the same floor.
whyDifferent.description1b: Others come to become stronger — physically and mentally.
whyDifferent.description2: We don't separate people by ego, age or background.
whyDifferent.description2a: We bring them together through structure, respect and consistency.
whyDifferent.closing: Because real strength is built over time.

training.subtitle: Training Programs
training.title: Three Paths. One Purpose.
training.strikingDesc: Boxing. Kickboxing. Muay Thai. Precision over power.
training.grapplingDesc: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. Wrestling. Control through technique.
training.mmaDesc: The complete discipline. For those ready to integrate all arts.

kids.subtitle: Kids Program
kids.description1: At Striker's House Kids, martial arts is a tool for growth.
kids.description2: Through structured training, children develop focus, respect, coordination, and self-control in a safe and disciplined environment.

dmitri.bio: Elite performance coach specializing in fighter-specific training. Builds explosive power and endurance for competition.

marcus.quote: No ego. No drama. Just people committed to getting better every single day.
